items.title: Three-front war for growth
items.text: AI raised expectations, collapsed distribution, and put everyone in a three-front war.

items.title: The new playbook: Trust
items.text: A new playbook emerged, and it centered growth on one concept: trust.

items.title: Classic channels stopped working
items.text: SEO, SEM, and corporate social got pricier and weaker as AI intercepted attention.

items.title: Trust-based acquisition channels
items.text: Employee voices, creators, community, and product experience drove word of mouth through trust.

items.title: Trust-based retention in a commoditized world
items.text: As AI commoditized utility, customers stayed with products they trusted to keep improving.

items.title: Operational shift and closing warning
items.text: Teams aligned, shipped fast, built in public, and raced before channels collapsed completely.
